snippet.title: VxVIGILANTES - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
𝗩𝘅𝗩𝗜𝗚𝗜𝗟𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗘𝗦 is a turn-based tactical game about superheroes and doing the right thing even when others look down on you.
𝗩𝘅𝗩𝗜𝗚𝗜𝗟𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗘𝗦 will have its alpha demo available 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟬/𝟭𝟭/𝟯𝟬 in itch.io.

************
From stopping thugs to overthrowing a secret society, join Control and his team and lead them to success in turn-based tactical combats.

Follow the journey of the Vigilantes initiative as they try to uncover the truth behind the disappearances of various gifted individuals.


➡ OUR ITCH.IO PAGE: https://otter-games.itch.io
➡ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/ottergamesdev
